title: US man dies after taking drug touted by Trump
description: Health officials are warning people not to self-medicate with the common malaria drug.
content:
Image copyrightAFP via Getty ImagesImage caption
 The FDA says no therapeutics or drugs are currently approved to treat or cure the coronavirus
An Arizona man has died and his wife is in a critical condition after both ingested a form of chloroquine in an a… [+3653 chars]
